attributes.action: ENSURE BANKS PASS ON ALL INTEREST RATE CUTS MADE BY BANK OF ENGLAND
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The banks are quick to pass on all interest rate rises (often from midnight the same day) but why is it we never ever receive it when they go down!!! even more so now as we the public now own most of them.This should now be law.please sign if you agree :)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
